remarks: The extension of a permutation is an element of the extended symmetric group.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Mar-2019.)
statement:
symgext.s $e |- S = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) $.
symgext.e $e |- E = ( x e. N |-> if ( x = K , K , ( Z ` x ) ) ) $.
symgextsymg $p |- ( ( N e. V /\ K e. N /\ Z e. S ) -> E e. ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) ) $.
$d K x $.
$d N x $.
$d S x $.
$d S x $.
$d Z x $.
